page.title: 14LEISURE PURSUITS - SURVEY
page.content: A survey completed by St. John's Junior School in Failsworth found the most popular pastimes were:- {ADULT} 1 Watching T.V. (254) 2 Listening to records (207{Figures 3 Listening to radio (205) {show } 4 Eating out (204) {numbers 5 Party going (198) {choosing 6 Visits to friends (191) {out of 7 Visits to pub (177) {424 (all {CHILDREN ages)} 1 Collecting (coins, key rings, rubbers, stamps) (136) 2 Reading comics/magazines (112) 3 Playing out (106) {113 4 Watching T.V. (97) {children 5 Reading Books (93) {interviewed 6 Visits to relatives (82){ages 8-11 7 Games (card/board) (80) 8 Swimming (75) 9 Helping parents (74)
